author: Allie Volpe
title: Q102 Jingle Ball lineup announced
text:
Entertainment Q102 Jingle Ball lineup announced Like the Christmas decorations slowly filling the shelves at stores in early October, the Philly concert scene is already preparing for the holiday season. Q102 Jingle Ball lineup announced Calvin Harris performs on Day 2 of the V Festival at Hylands Park on August 23, 2015 in Chelmsford, England. (Photo by Tristan Fewings/Getty Images) Getty Images Travel Deals Allie Volpe Posted: Monday, October 5, 2015, 5:30 PM 
Like the Christmas decorations slowly filling the shelves at stores in early October, the Philly concert scene is already preparing for the holiday season. 
Case in point: Q102 has announced the lineup for their annual Jingle Ball. Performers include Calvin Harris, Selena Gomez, 5 Seconds of Summer, Shawn Mendes, Tove Lo, Charlie Puth, Hailee Steinfeld, R. City, Natalie La Rose, Conrad Sewell and Alessia Cara . 
The pop extravaganza is set for Wednesday, Dec. 9 at the Wells Fargo Center . 
Tickets will go on sale on Monday, Oct. 12 at 10 a.m. online , by phone at 1-800-298-4200 or at the Wells Fargo Center box office. 
Canâ€™t wait until December? Shawn Mendes will perform Tuesday, Oct. 6 at Festival Pier as a part of the Forbes Under 30 Music Festival.
